Base1

Precompiling css

  • Pre-compiling css can be a bit confusing at first but when you get it right it is a smooth and fast tool to work with. When I made this site I used css Sass as pre-compiler.

  • The advantages with pre-compiling css is for me that it goes faster and that the files become easier to read. The disadvantages are that pre-compiling can be confusing when you start using it.

Sass Basics
